title: How do I mute the camera?
answer:
For EMUI 2.3, enter the camera viewfinder mode and select ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=123271). Select the Others tab and then select Mute. 

 For EMUI 3.0, enter the camera viewfinder mode and select ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=123272). Then select Settings and enable the Mute switch. 

 The camera will be muted automatically when the phone is set to silent or vibrate. You do not need to mute the camera manually. 

 * Some phone models do not support muting the camera.
keywords: take photos, mute, turn off, sound
